caseNumber.description: The case number for the loan.

borrowerName.description: The name of the borrower associated with this loan

lenderName.description: The name of the lender associated with this loan

propertyStreetAddress.description: The street address for the property associated with this loan

requestedFrom.description: Where the binder request came from (e.g. 'Records Center', 'Review Location', 'Lender')

requestedDate.description: The date when the binder request for this loan was sent to the lender

dueDate.description: The due date when the binder should be received from the lender

sentDate.description: The date that the binder was sent to the lender for review

receivedDate.description: The date that the binder was confirmed received from the lender

assignedTo.description: The person the binder is assigned to after it is received from the lender

reviewLocationId.description: The review location id for binder

locationName.description: The review location name for binder

isElectronic.description: Indicates if this binder is electronic.
